aṅkāt prasārya kara pallavam ādi bhikṣuḥ yāvat jagāda giram iddha tapa prabhāvaḥ

original: māraḥ palāyata tato mahatā balena bhraṣṭātapatrarathaketukuthena bhītaḥ // 10.45 //
analyzed: māraḥ palāyata tatas mahatā balena bhraṣṭa ātapatra ratha ketu kuthena bhītaḥ  /
māra aṅganāḥ tadanu manthara dṛṣṭipātāḥ vācāla ratna pada nūpura pārihāryāḥ
sadyas sametya catur asra viśāla garbham cakruḥ tad agra bhuvi tāṇḍavam ati udāram
antar samāhita samādhi rasa anuṣaktam ālokya śākya kula nandanam aprakampyam

original: karṇāmṛtāni vacanāni ca kātarākṣyaḥ kāmāṅganā vidadhire karuṇākṣarāṇi // 10.47 //
analyzed: karṇa amṛtāni vacanāni ca kātara akṣyaḥ kāma aṅganāḥ vidadhire karuṇa akṣarāṇi
asyai patat madana sāyaka vihvalāyai dṛṣṭi pradānam api kartum a pārayantam

original: utpāṭya locanayugaṃ dvijapuṅgavāya tvāṃ dattavāniti kathaṃ bruvate purāṇāḥ // 10.48 //
analyzed: utpāṭya locana yugam dvija puṅgavāya tvām dattavān iti katham bruvate purāṇāḥ
magnām mahā makaraketana vāri rāśau mām ittham ādhi vidhurām avalamba śūnyām
uddhartum api akuśalaḥ janana amburāśeḥ uttārayiṣyasi katham tvam aśeṣa lokam
dṛṣṭvā asmadīyam anavadyatamam vilāsam ślāghā śiraḥ vidhutim api ati dūrayantam

original: ucchīdya mastakamudastaripuprabhāvaṃ tvāṃ dattavāniti vadanti kathaṃ kavīndrāḥ // 10.50 //
analyzed: ucchīdya mastakam udasta ripu prabhāvam tvām dattavān iti vadanti katham kavi indrāḥ
puṇya ātmanām adhipate
puruṣottama tvam āptum padam tvam abhivāñchasi kim tapobhiḥ

original: asmāsu kāmapi vadhūmadhiropaya tvaṃ vakṣastaṭe mahati meruśilāviśāle // 10.51 //
analyzed: asmāsu kām api vadhūm adhiropaya tvam vakṣaḥ taṭe mahati meru śilā viśāle
bhadra anvavāyam atha vā parameśvara tvam ākāṃkṣase samupayātum alam tapobhiḥ
kām api amūṣu kamala āyata dṛṣṭipātām vāma alakām tvam adhirohayam vāma bhāge
ānanda kandalita locana vibhramāṇām ambhoruha prakara garva galagrahāṇām
āvis smita ānana rucām avalokanānām pātrībhavanti sudṛśām nanu bhāgyavantaḥ
ākṛṣṭa rakta parapuṣṭa vacaḥ vilāsāt ālocana anta vivṛta ādṛta karṇa peyāt
āścarya bhaṅgi subhagāt aparokṣa saukhyāt ābhāṣaṇāt mṛga dṛśām amṛtam kim anyat  /
aśrānta pāna saham auṣadham ātma yoni tāpa udayeṣu anupadaṃśam anaḥ abhirāmam
a kṣīyamāṇam adhara amṛtam aṅganānām āsvādya tāmayati puṇyavatām hi puṃsām
evaṃvidhaiḥ lalita bhāva rasa anuviddhaiḥ nṛtta kramaiḥ nirupamaiḥ vacasām vilāsaiḥ
ālokya buddham avikampita cittavṛttim lajjā vaśāt pratinivṛtya yayuḥ taruṇyaḥ
ittham puṣpaśarāsanasya vijaya vyāpāra śuṣka sthitām
sambodhi prasadām niveśya sudṛśam śrī bodhi mūle varaḥ
siddhārthaḥ cira vāsanā parigatān ucchidya doṣa dviṣaḥ
mukti kṣetra kuṭumba rakṣaṇa vidhau mūdhārbhiṣiktaḥ bhavat  /
